 United States Constitution, an important document in American political and

'American philosophy' is the philosophical activity or output of Americans, both
within the United States and abroad. The [[Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy]]
notes that while American philosophy lacks a "core of defining features,
American Philosophy can nevertheless be seen as both reflecting and shaping
collective American identity over the history of the nation." [http://www.iep.utm.edu/a/american.htm "American philosophy" at
the Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy] Retrieved on May 24, 2009
